entry.title: Yaadein
entry.content: Watch the Bollywood Romantic movie Yaadein (2001) directed by Subhash Ghai & produced under Subhash Ghai’s banner Mukta Arts. The movie stars Hrithik Roshan, Kareena Kapoor, Jackie Shroff, Amrish Puri, Himani Rawat, Kiran Rathod, Anang Desai, Supriya Karnik, Avni Vasha, Madan Joshi, Suman Dutta, Suhaas Khandke, Ranjan Kapoor, Jennifer Kotwal, Rahul Singh, Dolly Bindra, Kamal Adib, Gargi Patel, Rati Agnihotri, Subhash Ghai, Akhil Ghai.

entry.title: Kisna: The Warrior Poet
entry.content: Kisna: The Warrior Poet is a triangular love tale of Kisna (Vivek Oberoi), a revolutionary poet, Katherine (Antonia Bernath) and Lakshmi (Isha Sharvani), set in pre-independent India. Kisna befriends Katherine and saves her from a mob of nationalists which include his own uncle and brother. Katherine’s father is a ruthless British collector who is the root cause of this movement. Kisna is engaged to Lakshmi who is deeply and possessively in love with him. To ensure Katherine’s safety, Kisna decides to hand her over to the British High Commission in New Delhi. Both take this perilous journey and come closer. Will Kisna be able to take her to the destination? Will their love become an hindrance in their path? What will be of Lakshmi?

entry.title: Imtihan
entry.content: Watch the superhit Bollywood hit Hindi romantic movie Imtihaan (1995) directed by Harry Baweja. The movie stars Saif Ali Khan, Sunny Deol, Raveena Tandon, Gulshan Grover, Shakti Kapoor, Mohan Joshi. Music composed by Anu Malik.

entry.title: Bedardi
entry.content: Nirbhay Saxena (Naseeruddin Shah) is a renowned professor who values his self respect more than anything else. His younger brother Vijay (Ajay Devgan) goes to college where he meet Honey (Urmila Matondkar) and after a few altercations both fall in love with each other. The lives of the Saxena family is disrupted when two lakh rupees are stolen from Vijay which were to be used for his sisters wedding. Vijay in desperation to get the money back, accepts a contract to kill a man named Gulla – not knowing that he is being set-up to kill none other than Nirbhay himself. Behind all the menace is the villain K.K. (Kiran Kumar) who is seeking revenge against Nirbhay and will unleash hell to tear Nirbhay’s family apart. To put an end to all the evil plans of K.K., Nirbhay and Vijay must unite and turn merciless to fight the odds stacked against them. With thrilling action and high voltage drama, Can the two brothers spell doom for K.K?

entry.title: Armaan
entry.content: Dr. Siddharth Sinha (Amitabh Bachchan) is a dedicated selfless doctor who dreams of building a state-of-the-art hospital with all the modern instruments and amenities for patient care. He has a adopted son, Akash (Anil Kapoor) who also is a doctor, working to fulfill his father’s dream. Akash falls in love with Neha Mathur (Gracy Singh), an anesthetist in the hospital he works. Akash meets Sonia (Preity Zinta), who is the arrogant daughter of millionaire, Gulshan Kapoor (Randhir Kapoor). Soon Sonia falls for Akash and wants to marry him at any cost. Gulshan Kapoor proposes to Dr. Siddharth Sinha that he will donate a huge sum of money for his hospital project, on the condition that Akash marries Sonia . Dr. Siddharth Sinha declines the offer but passes away of a heart attack a few days later. Burdened with fulfilling his father’s dream , Akash decides to sacrifice his love for Neha and marry Sonia. But after marriage Sonia becomes increasingly jealous of Neha and constantly accuses Akash of infidelity. Sonia’s nature threatens the life of Neha, leaving Akash torn between two women. How will Akash deal with Sonia’s menace? Will Neha and Akash unite?
